definition: to record/to put down in writing
(chess) move/trick/all right!/(dialect) to add
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
to wear (clothes)/to contact/to use/to apply
diary/record/to hit/to copy
surname Lu

sentences.english: Modern book editions are complicated and various, but the rules of book description are backward.
sentences.chinese: 現代圖書版本類型複雜多樣，而著錄規則滯後。

sentences.english: The sea, in addition to describe the geographic positions, also recorded the styles of countries and people which are far away .
sentences.chinese: 《海經》除著錄地理方位外，還記載遠國異人的風貌。

sentences.english: The author index has entries arranged in alphabetical order of author's surnames.
sentences.chinese: 著者索引中有按著者姓氏字母順序排列的著錄。

sentences.english: The Epitaph of Wang Tai-ruren, Xiong Mingyu's Mother, in the Ming Dynasty has never been seen in any description.
sentences.chinese: 明代熊明遇之母王太孺人墓誌至今未見有著錄。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the duplicate checking in the process of cataloging and the description of bibliographic citations.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了圖書編目過程中的查重工作和書目數據的著錄。

sentences.english: There are two record methods in ancient Chinese booklist record, i. e. inter record method and analytic method .
sentences.chinese: 中國古代書目著錄有互著和別裁兩種方法。

sentences.english: In appendix, we extracted the records concerning this book from past catalogues.
sentences.chinese: 附錄集錄歷代書目對景德傳燈錄的著錄。

sentences.english: There are a passel of ancient pottery script which have not been recorded in the cultural relic collection room of Jilin University.
sentences.chinese: 吉林大學文物室藏着一批古陶文實物，皆未經著錄。

sentences.english: There are many errors when The Booklist of Chinese Ancient Rare Books registered the copy.
sentences.chinese: 《中國古籍善本書目》著錄丁本時有誤。

sentences.english: Objective To understand the citation of foreign-language references of articles in nursing periodicals.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解護理期刊論文外文參考文獻著錄情況。

sentences.english: While I was concentrating on monographic publications, he recorded articles in journals.
sentences.chinese: 我專注於專題論文之出版，他著錄期刊中的文獻。

definition: printing plate bearing an image (illustration, photo etc)/print made with such a plate
catalog
short comments/preface and postscript
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
to include (in a collection)/to put together (stories, poems etc)/to record/to employ/to recruit
a series of books/a collection of books
document
anthology
marginal notes/annotation/to annotate/to add comments to text
seal script (Chinese calligraphic style)
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
editor in chief
to refer to/see also/compare (cf.)/to pay respect to
to write down/to record/written account
